title: The Killer Bride
overview: The amnesiac girl killer Yueyao finally faced her first killing mission at the age of sixteen. Yueyao was ordered by her master to assassinate the "cruel" General He Yunxing of the Fourteenth Yamen. Yueyao failed to sneak into the general's mansion to assassinate her, and was tricked by He Yunxing into becoming his newly married bride!
